column1: Justice   Janak   de   Silva   in  Multiform   Chemicals   Limited   vs   Adrian   Machado11
distinguishes admissibility of evidence from the evidential value given to a piece of
“Probative value of evidence means the weight to be attached to the evidence tendered
and is different from admissibility of evidence. It is a question of fact that cannot be
regulated by a set of precise rules.”
